(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBD had)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB pick)
              (NP (NN something))
              (PP (IN as)
                (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ last) (NN meal)))))))
      (, ,))))


mark(had-3, If-1)
nsubj(had-3, I-2)
root(ROOT-0, had-3)
aux(pick-5, to-4)
xcomp(had-3, pick-5)
dobj(pick-5, something-6)
prep(pick-5, as-7)
poss(meal-10, my-8)
amod(meal-10, last-9)
pobj(as-7, meal-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (MD would)
      (VP (VB have)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB be)
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (NNS slices))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP
                    (ADJP (RB wonderfully) (JJ marbled))
                    (NNP Wagyu)))
                (PP (IN over)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT a) (NN bowl))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (S
                        (VP (VBG steaming)
                          (ADJP (JJ hot)))))))))))))
    (, ,)))

aux(have-3, would-2)
root(ROOT-0, have-3)
aux(slices-8, to-4)
cop(slices-8, be-5)
det(slices-8, a-6)
amod(slices-8, few-7)
xcomp(have-3, slices-8)
prep(slices-8, of-9)
advmod(marbled-11, wonderfully-10)
amod(Wagyu-12, marbled-11)
pobj(of-9, Wagyu-12)
prep(slices-8, over-13)
det(bowl-15, a-14)
pobj(over-13, bowl-15)
prep(bowl-15, of-16)
pcomp(of-16, steaming-17)
acomp(steaming-17, hot-18)

    (SBAR (RB only)

        (NP (PRP it))

    (. !)))
